alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 11:23AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Dawson and southern Richland Counties through NOON MDT... At 1121 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Sidney to 10 miles south of Richey. Movement was south southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Fairview, Lambert, Bloomfield, Savage, Intake, Enid, Stipek, Midway, Wooley, Burns and Crane. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 15 and 21, between mile markers 39 and 71, between mile markers 53 and 62, and between mile markers 307 and 316. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
